overview:
DudGames is a video game development studio formed in early 2011.

Mainly established by passionate gamers, Dudgames’ aim is to produce and share games online for free.

The DudGames team has an expansive experience in game development, having worked on several titles released on PC (offline and online), Nintendo Wii, Xbox 360, Playstation 3 and even mobile and iOS.

Dudgames aims the development of wholesome and fun games for all ages to play. As testament to the company’s logo and namesake, the studio has made it a constant effort to deviate from the norm of hardcore and violence - themes that often alienate the younger and the much older market. In doing so, the company’s focus in genre allows them to tap into a wider market of gamers.
